website_summaries.verdict: A colorful backpack for children ages 2 to 4 that keeps them organized with small compartments for toys or snacks.
pros: Ideal for families who take walking-heavy day trips and want to keep children’s essentials close
Bright colors and large zipper pulls are great for children
Light enough that it won’t affect posture or weigh down the child
cons: Not ideal for school use, as it doesn’t fit standard folders or notebooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this little bag. I got it to use for my baby to put her stuff in just to run down the rd and back to the house. Has more room than you think and my favorite color is pink.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Arrington

customer_reviews.title: toddler size, but still fits A LOT
customer_reviews.text: needed a bag big enough for a toddler blanket, a water bottle, snacks, coloring books, markers, a few little toys and her favorite stuffed animal, but also something she could carry herself. it fits that and then some, and she loves it. perfect for our 3 y.o.'s first airplane trip.
customer_reviews.author: Angela L. Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit a folder.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack. Unfortunately my daughter's (She's 3) school insisted that I purchase another to fit folders in so I purchased the larger youth side.
customer_reviews.author: Renée

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 4 year old traveling
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! My 4 year old uses it when we travel. It fits her perfectly and is easy for her to carry through airports.
customer_reviews.author: ClubSoda

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute color. Perfect size for my 3 1/2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Puff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for my toddler. We bought this for our plane ride and it fit her perfect and has plenty of space for all her little toys and coloring pages.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Angle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have little kids so this serves as a diaper bag/purse for me so I don't have to take the big diaper bag out of the car and I love it! Son had one first and loved it so much I got my own lol
customer_reviews.author: cody linner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but still very cute and great for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Hughes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to read the size. This is so small it wouldn't work for my kindergartener.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love this and my daughter too! she loves getting to carry her own stuff around!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Anderson

product_meta.title: The North Face Youth Sprout Backpack
product_meta.description: Designed for kids age two to four, this toddler-sized, 10-liter daypack from The North Face allows young explorers to carry their own juice box, snacks and souvenirs from the trail. The North Face backpack Main compartment sized just right for your little ones External zippered pocket for smaller trinkets and treasures Comfortable, stitched-foam back panel Mesh water bottle pockets can double as treasure keepers Reflective bike-light loop Breakaway sternum straps designed specifically for kids; Internal name label so they'll never lose their bag; Lifetime warranty Volume: 610 in (10 liters); Dimensions: 11.5" x 8.5" x 5" (29 cm x 22 cm x 12.5 cm) Fabric: 600D polyester, 1200D polyester Imported
feature_bullets: Main compartment sized just right for your little ones
External zippered pocket for smaller trinkets and treasures
Mesh water bottle pockets can double as treasure keepers
